name: Aahh! Spot the Difference
description:
But you must be quick, as most of the objects and the camera are constantly moving. You can also test your skills in three additional modes: Survival, Speed Attack and Time Attack. You will earn one star for finding the required number of differences, two stars will be awarded if you find more, and if you find all the differences in the level you will receive three stars. Good luck!

Features

• 4 unique game modes
• 4 different locations
• 40 challenging levels
• Become the Extreme Spotting Master
